personal.summary: Engenheiro de Software, AWS Certified Developer – Associate, com 10 anos de experiência em desenvolvimento web e mobile. Delivered features for core platforms, reduced technical debt by refactoring legacy code, and optimized development processes using Elixir, React, and Kubernetes.
Collaborated on CRM solutions for enterprise customers. Delivered full-stack solutions and modernized legacy codebases using Java, SQL, and React.
Built tailored software solutions including stock and operations management systems using PHP, Laravel, and Angular.
Migrated features from AngularJS to Angular 2 and developed solutions for public sector compliance using Laravel and AWS.
Delivered custom WordPress sites and responsive templates from PSD designs.
